chapter.title: Commentaires personnels
chapter.para:
To build up a personal commentary you will need to install the editable 'Personal' sword module from the English Commentaries section. Right click it and choose edit->Personal in the pop-up menus.
L'édition de commentaires presonnels nécessite l'utilisation du module Sword 'Personal'. Les commentaires en anglais sont à sélectionner, puis le module 'Personal' Sélectionnez les commentaires en anglais, cliquez du bouton droit de la souris sur edit->Personal
An editor window similar to the Study Pad will appear. Edit your comment and save it, in future it will appear as your comment to the relevant verse.

Use the Synchronise Button to quickly change location of your editor to that of the underlying Bibletext or use the Book , Chapter and Verse selectors to choose to edit your comment to one particular verse.

chapter.para: To create a link to other verses right click the text and choose Link... In the pop-up window enter the link location and the module linked to.

tip.para: The created commentary page will be attached to an individual verse only. To write commentary pages from within the Gnomesword, attached to longer stretches of text use the Link.. function to link several pages together
